thread.title: Trevecca Nazarene University Welcomes Blackboard On Campus
thread.title_full: Trevecca Nazarene University Welcomes Blackboard On Campus

author: admin
title: Trevecca Nazarene University Welcomes Blackboard On Campus
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/25/2015 @ 12:45 PM   Blackboard Inc. 
WASHINGTON, Sept. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Blackboard Inc. ("Blackboard") today announced a new partnership with Trevecca Nazarene University (TNU) that will deliver a more engaging digital teaching and learning solution at the university and help boost the schools student retention efforts. 
The Nashville-based University will leverage Blackboard's Learning Essentials solution, which includes the company's flagship learning management system and virtual collaborative learning tools. Blackboard delivered a robust, cost-effective and innovative suite of offerings that seamlessly and fully integrates with other systems on campus, meeting the university's needs better than any other company. 
TNU is focused on increasing enrollment and retention, the delivery of cost savings with the consolidation of technology, while simultaneously delivering a better student experience and increased faculty and student engagement. 
"We look forward to being able to help the students at TNU have the best possible technology experience on campus, while at the same time helping the institution solve its most pressing problems," said Jay Bhatt, CEO of Blackboard. "Whenever we can make a difference in creating an engaging, meaningful and successful experience for both learner and institution, we know we are having a positive impact on education." 
About Blackboard Inc. Blackboard is the world's leading education technology company. We challenge conventional thinking and advance new models of learning in order to reimagine education and make it more accessible, engaging and relevant to the modern-day learner and the institutions that serve them. In partnership with our customers in higher education and K-12 as well as corporations and government agencies around the world, our mission is to help every learner achieve their full potential by inspiring a passion for lifelong learning. For more information about Blackboard, follow us on Twitter @Blackboard. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/trevecca-nazarene-university-welcomes-blackboard-on-campus-300149338.html 
SOURCE Blackboard Inc.
